features.name: Wallet Authentication (Dev Mode)
features.description: Auto-login via VITE_DEV_WALLET env var or ?dev_wallet= URL param. Uses devLogin API endpoint that issues JWT without Freighter signature. Supports manual disconnect without auto-reconnect.

features.name: Invoice Dashboard
features.description: Lists all invoices for the authenticated user with status badges (draft, funding, completed, released, cancelled), amounts, participant counts, and navigation to detail pages.

features.name: Invoice Creation
features.description: Form to create group invoices with name, description, deadline, penalty settings, auto-release toggle, and line items (from service catalog or custom). Frontend validation: name required, deadline required and in future, at least one item, items must have description and positive amount.

features.name: Invoice Detail & On-Chain Actions
features.description: Shows invoice details with progress bar, participant list, and action panel. Actions vary by status: draft (link to blockchain, cancel), funding (join, contribute, withdraw, release, cancel, claim deadline), completed (confirm release, withdraw, organizer release), released/cancelled (read-only status messages). All on-chain actions build mock XDR in dev mode.

features.name: Soroban Transaction Builder (Mock)
features.description: Builds, simulates, and signs Soroban smart contract transactions. In DEV_MODE, returns mock XDR without hitting Soroban RPC or Freighter. Backend accepts mock XDR and returns simulated results.

features.name: Service Catalog
features.description: Public page displaying all active services from registered businesses. Each card shows service name, description, price, and business name. Supports keyword search filtering.

features.name: Business Management
features.description: CRUD operations for businesses owned by the authenticated user. Create, edit, view, and manage businesses. Each business has services, wallet address, and contact info.

features.name: Service Management
features.description: Add and edit services under a business. Each service has name, description, price, and optional image.

features.name: User Profile
features.description: Displays authenticated user's wallet address, username, role, and account creation date.

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin-only pages for platform management: user list with role modification, business overview, invoice management, and platform statistics.

features.name: Layout & Navigation
features.description: Header with navigation links that change based on auth state (public: Services; authenticated: Invoices, My Businesses; admin: Admin). Mobile hamburger menu. Landing page with hero section.

features.name: API Service Layer
features.description: Centralized API client with axios. All endpoints prefixed with /api. Includes auth interceptor for JWT, invoice CRUD, business CRUD, service CRUD, participant management, and blockchain link operations.
